item.title: BO - International - Localization - Geolocation - Update options
item.description: BO - International - Localization - Geolocation - Update options Details Component : Core Status : Blocked Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1007 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > International > Localization > Geolocation Geolocation page is displayed In Options block > Edit Select the countries from which your store is accessible > Unselect all countries > Save Country selection is invalid. message is displayed In Options block > In Select the countries from which your store is accessible > Uncheck Select all and check only first country > Save Update successful message is displayed In Options block > In Select the countries from which your store is accessible > Click Select all > Edit Geolocation behavior for restricted countries > Save Update successful message is displayed In Options block > In Select the countries from which your store is accessible > Edit Geolocation behavior for other countries > Save Update successful message is displayed
